title: Soil Moisture and Litter Coverage Drove the Altitude Gradient Pattern of Soil Arthropods Community in a Low Elevation Mountain
content: In order to investigate the vertical distribution pattern of soil fauna community in low-altitude mountain areas. On July 8th, 2022, a low hill was selected as the study area to collect soil arthropods were collected through trap. Leaf litter, vegetation type and distribution quantity were investigated at each sampling site while soil fauna were collected.
